object.name: ChatBoostSourceGiveaway
object.description: The boost was obtained by the creation of a Telegram Premium giveaway. This boosts the chat 4 times for the duration of the corresponding Telegram Premium subscription.
object.html_description: The boost was obtained by the creation of a Telegram Premium giveaway. This boosts the chat 4 times for the duration of the corresponding Telegram Premium subscription.
object.rst_description: The boost was obtained by the creation of a Telegram Premium giveaway. This boosts the chat 4 times for the duration of the corresponding Telegram Premium subscription.

annotations.description: Identifier of a message in the chat with the giveaway; the message could have been deleted already. May be 0 if the message isn't sent yet.
annotations.html_description: Identifier of a message in the chat with the giveaway; the message could have been deleted already. May be 0 if the message isn't sent yet.
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of a message in the chat with the giveaway; the message could have been deleted already. May be 0 if the message isn't sent yet.
annotations.name: giveaway_message_id

annotations.description: User that won the prize in the giveaway if any
annotations.html_description: Optional. User that won the prize in the giveaway if any
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. User that won the prize in the giveaway if any
annotations.name: user

annotations.description: True, if the giveaway was completed, but there was no user to win the prize
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the giveaway was completed, but there was no user to win the prize
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the giveaway was completed, but there was no user to win the prize
annotations.name: is_unclaimed
